alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 10:09AM MST until February 17 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches with up to 7 inches over the peaks. * WHERE...Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire traction will be reduced. Extend the distance between your vehicle and the vehicle in front of you.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.
